titleStmt.title: De cometis ubi de cometarum natura differitur : nova cometarum theoria, novissimi cometæ historia, proponitur / prælectio, Oxonii habita à Setho Wardo, in celeberrima academia, astronomiæ professore Saviliano, cui subjuncta est inquisitio In Ismaelis Bullialdi, astronomiæ philolaiæ fundamenta, eodem authore.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Seth, 1617-1689.

titleStmt.title: De cometis ubi de cometarum natura differitur : nova cometarum theoria, novissimi cometæ historia, proponitur / prælectio, Oxonii habita à Setho Wardo, in celeberrima academia, astronomiæ professore Saviliano, cui subjuncta est inquisitio In Ismaelis Bullialdi, astronomiæ philolaiæ fundamenta, eodem authore.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Seth, 1617-1689.

notesStmt.note: "In Ismaelis Bullialdi astronomiæ philolaicæ fundamenta" has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
